about_the_game:
Run, fight or flee! In Powder Runners: Maze Quest, you and your team will face dangerous mazes in a race against opponents and traps. Grab weapons to face enemies, collect healing items to survive and make quick decisions: is it worth engaging in combat or is it better to simply run? And get ahead!

Each match is a battle of strategy, speed and courage. Do you have what it takes to come out on top and achieve glory?

Play alone or call your friends.

Powder Runners: Maze Quest is an action, adventure and strategy game where every second counts! Enter treacherous mazes full of mysteries, traps and choices, where the goal is simple: be the first to reach the portal. But be careful – other players are also after victory, and they won't make your journey easy!

Run, fight or flee! In Powder Runners: Maze Quest, you and your team will face dangerous mazes in a race against opponents and traps. Grab weapons to face enemies, collect healing items to survive and make quick decisions: is it worth engaging in combat or is it better to simply run? And get ahead!

Each match is a battle of strategy, speed and courage. Do you have what it takes to come out on top and achieve glory?

Play alone or call your friends.

Powder Runners: Maze Quest is an action, adventure and strategy game where every second counts! Enter treacherous mazes full of mysteries, traps and choices, where the goal is simple: be the first to reach the portal. name: Powder Runners: Maze Quest

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 de 64 bits
  • Processor: A quad-core AMD or Intel processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or AMD VEGA 64 graphics card or higher is recommended.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: DirectX 11 or 12-compatible graphics card For best results, high-end hardware is recommended. For example, to take advantage of Nanite, Virtual Shadow Maps, and Lumen, an NVIDIA GTX 1080 or AMD VEGA 64 graphics card or higher is recommended.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 de 64 bits
  • Processor: A quad-core AMD or Intel processor, 3.2 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 or AMD VEGA 64 graphics card or higher is recommended.
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: DirectX 11 or 12-compatible graphics card For best results, high-end hardware is recommended. For example, to take advantage of Nanite, Virtual Shadow Maps, and Lumen, an NVIDIA GTX 1080 or AMD VEGA 64 graphics card or higher is recommended.

short_description: Grab your friends and take on this epic challenge as a team or go solo to prove you’re the best! But remember: only the fastest and most cunning will achieve glory. Get ready for chaos, strategy and excitement – ​​the maze awaits!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
